QuestData.Title: Fight and Flight
QuestData.Description:
Alexandros and Emeni will lead the Chosen assault on the western gate.
You and Xandria will direct your forces at the eastern gate. Secure the area and eliminate any resistance.
Once both flanks are secured we can attack Gharmal directly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly with Xandria to the House of Constructs.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Xandria by the Hall of Chains.
